detail_desc: Trousers in soft silk with a high, elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.

Dress in mesh with sequined embroidery, pin-tucks at the top, buttons at the back and short butterfly sleeves. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Satin lining.
Fine-knit jumper made partly from recycled polyester with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Decorative seam centre front and back, and a straight-cut hem.
Hair decoration made of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable fastening.

Set with a long-sleeved hooded top and pair of leggings in printed jersey made from a cotton blend. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a hood with a wrapover front, ribbing at the cuffs, and a raw-edge hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with short fringes along the sides.

Short pleated chiffon dress in a narrow cut at the top with a halter neck with a hook-and-eye fastener. Opening front and back, seam at the waist with narrow elasticated straps, a concealed zip in the side and flared skirt. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Dress with a soft jersey bodice, zip at the back and cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, flared, voluminous skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with a contrasting colour pompom trim down the sides.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, metal press-studs down the front, chest pockets and long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs. Unlined.
Gloves in supple leather with a slit and elastication at the cuffs. Soft wool-blend lining.
Vest top in airy slub linen jersey with a racer back and rounded hem.
Sports jacket in thermal faux shearling with nylon sections. Stand-up collar, a zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket and zipped side pockets. Elasticated trims around the cuffs and hem.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam with a decorative drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with gathered hems.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders. Ribbed shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a soft, detachable belt, pleats at the top and a zip fly. Low crotch, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Seam just above the knee and a flared flounce to the hem. Long at the back and slightly shorter at the front. Unlined.

Winter running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with windproof sections on the legs and elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist with a zipped key pocket at the back. Mesh sections at the crotch and back of the knees, a zip at the hems and reflective details. Brushed thermal inside.
Dress in sweatshirt material with a stand-up collar and zip at the top in a straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless playsuit in jersey with a V-neck, buttons at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with concealed elastication at the waist. Unlined.
Imitation leather sandals with decorative tassels and a hook and loop fastener on one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Grained imitation leather card holder in the shape of a small handbag with a handle at the top and a flap with a press-stud. On the inside of the flap are the fastenings for the accompanying narrow metal chain shoulder strap with a trigger clasp. Four large inner compartments and three smaller compartments. Size 1.5x7x10 cm.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar, button placket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Side pockets, a narrow detachable belt and rounded hem. Unlined.
Blouse woven in an airy linen blend with a square neckline front and back, buttons down the front, puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and ends, and a flared peplum.
Long top in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, visible seams at the top and back and a rounded hem. Raw edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Set with a long-sleeved top and dungaree dress in soft fabric. Top in cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Dungaree dress in woven fabric with an open chest pocket, concealed press-stud in one side and straps with adjustable buttoning.
Hipster briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims. Mid waist, a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Belt in embossed imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a small loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2 cm.
Cropped trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, a decorative ring at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Velvet Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Mesh trainers with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate(EVA) and rubber soles.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Pouch in transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 9x10x18 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine, printed knit with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Handbag accessory in the shape of a tied scarf in a patterned weave with a sewn-in metal keyring and carabiner hook. Length approx. 34 cm.
Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a patterned, crinkled weave with a V-neck with a pleat at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with covered buttons at the cuffs. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt with a sewn-in wrapover and flounced trim. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with a high, elasticated waist and zip down the front.
Ankle-high sandals with open toes, open heels, a zip in one side and covered block heels. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Platform 1.5 cm, heel 11 cm.

Wide, high-waisted, knee-length shorts in woven fabric containing some linen. Wide waistband with buttons at the waist, a safety button inside and belt loops. Zip fly, diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with pleats for added width.

Trousers in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud, diagonal side pockets with smaller inner pockets, welt back pockets and flap leg pockets with concealed press-studs. Legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and an elastic drawstring at the hems. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and button. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Short-sleeved blouse in lace with raw, scalloped edges and buttons down the back. Unlined.

Pull-on trousers in soft cotton twill with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and a frill trim at the top. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. One patterned pair.

Small shoulder bag in cotton twill covered in plastic beads with a zip at the top, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Height 14 cm. Width 20 cm.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a silk blend with stitched seams front and back.

Seamless sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Lightly padded cups with removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and wide trim at the hem. Light support.

Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend with a stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Welt side pockets, one inner pocket, a zip at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck. Straight cut at the top and a flared skirt with gathers at the sides.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Cropped jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Slightly shorter, gently fitted, long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a soft, brushed finish.
Top in soft viscose jersey with lace over the shoulders and a rounded hem.
Lightweight jacket with a high stand-up collar, zip down the front, and side pockets. Lined. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers.
Double-layered jersey hat made from a cotton blend with sewn-on rabbit ears at the top and a hook and loop fastening under the chin.

Dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Shorts in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Short jumper in a fine-knit stretch viscose blend. Wide sleeves in a cotton weave with pleats and ribbed cuffs.
